name: Fulgent Genetics, Inc.
description: Fulgent Genetics, Inc. is a leading technology company in the field of genetic testing and genomic services. Established in 2011, the company focuses on providing comprehensive genetic testing solutions that enable healthcare providers to make informed decisions in patient care. Fulgent offers a wide range of tests, including hereditary cancer testing, carrier screening, and non-invasive prenatal testing (NIPT), utilizing advanced technology and bioinformatics to deliver precise and reliable results. With a commitment to innovation, Fulgent integrates next-generation sequencing (NGS) and other cutting-edge technologies in its testing processes. The company aims to empower patients and clinicians through accessible genetic information, contributing to personalized medicine and improved healthcare outcomes. Fulgent's robust data analytics capabilities facilitate the interpretation of complex genetic data, guiding treatment options and enhancing patient management. The company is also dedicated to expanding its testing menu to cover emerging areas of genetics, reflecting its vision of transforming healthcare through genetic insights. Fulgent's mission is to make genetic testing more accessible and affordable, helping to shape the future of preventive and personalized medicine.

seo.meta_title: Fulgent Genetics, Inc. | Leading Genetic Testing Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Fulgent Genetics, Inc., a pioneer in genetic testing and genomic services. Learn about our innovative solutions and commitment to personalized medicine.

faq.question: What does Fulgent Genetics specialize in?
faq.answer: Fulgent Genetics specializes in genetic testing and genomic services, including hereditary cancer testing and carrier screening.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fulgent Genetics?
faq.answer: Ming Hsieh is the CEO of Fulgent Genetics, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fulgent Genetics headquartered?
faq.answer: Fulgent Genetics is headquartered in Temple City, California, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Fulgent Genetics?
faq.answer: Fulgent Genetics offers hereditary cancer testing, carrier screening, and non-invasive prenatal testing among other genomic services.
